name: Coffee
instructions: Boil Water. Add coffee to your fav Coffee Mug, Add Water, Add Milk, Add Sugar and Sip!

name: Tea
ingredients: Tea, Water, Milk, Sugar, Ginger, Tulip
instructions: Add water and milk along with tea and sugar and tulip to a container and put the gas on, once the mix starts to boil, add ginger crushed, wait for two or three boils and thats it
